coded_answer.p: I am writtingwriting to you because yesterday I went to the musical show "Over the Rainbow" and I had a bad evening.

Also in the advertisement it says, that the show willwould begin at 19.30 and it started at 20.15; that meanmeant that I havehad to cancelledcancel a date that I had at 21:00, because I coudn'tcouldn't make it. If you presentput on a show you must be on time.

Another thing that happenedI discovered was that the tickets did not have discountthere were no discount tickets and the advertisement sayssaid thethere willwould havebe. So, how is it possible that you presentpublish an advertisement and you don't makedo what it saysays?
Finally, ityou suposesupposewere supposed to have the restaurant open, and it wasn't, because they didn't have electricity to cook, so they closeclosed it.
I am really mademad and I want my money back, please. Please call me toon the number 23456789, I will be waiting for your call. Thank you for your time
How has modern technology changed your daily life?
Modern technology havehas changechanged my daily life in many aspectsways.
First of all, at work; computercomputers are really amazing, you only need to turn itone on and start to write; your work is more cleanneater and you work faster.

AlsoIt has also changechanged my free time,; they hadhave invented great games like play station, and you can have a really good time with your friend playingplaying with your friend. In the early dayold days, on a rainingrainy day you couldn't play because most of gamegames were played outside the house but now with themodern technology you can makedo many things in your house.
Another aspect is that, on the house artefactsdomestic appliances, - microwaves, laundrymachinewashing machines, - make life easilyeasier.
In my opinion technology havehas made human lifeliving easilyeasier, funierfunniermore fun and more comfortable.
